content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I am pleased to meet you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am asking for 650 Euro per month for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low. I am looking for a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
700 Euros per month will be fine.
